    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    #define mod 1000000007
    #define ll long long int

    using namespace std;

    string s;

    int main() {
        ll n, i, t, x, ans;
        cin >> t;
        while (t--) {
            bool flag = false;
            cin >> s;
            for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
                if (s[i] == 'a' || s[i] == 'e' || s[i] == 'i' || s[i] == 'o' || s[i] == 'u') {
                    flag = true;
                }
            }
            if (flag) {
                cout << "yes\n";
            } else {
                cout << "no\n";
            }
        }
        return 0;
    }
